mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rank (id, uid, qid, accuracy, ranking) VALUES (NULL, #{uid}, #{qid}, #{accuracy}, #{ranking})
mapper.select: SELECT id, uid, qid, accuracy, ranking FROM rank WHERE qid = #{qid} ORDER BY CAST(accuracy AS DECIMAL(5,2)) DESC, id ASC

SELECT r.ranking as ranking, u.username as username, r.accuracy as accuracy, ROUND(CAST(r.accuracy AS DECIMAL(5,2)) * 5 / 100, 0) as score FROM rank r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.id WHERE r.qid = #{qid} ORDER BY CAST(r.accuracy AS DECIMAL(5,2)) DESC, r.id ASC
SELECT id, uid, qid, accuracy, ranking FROM rank WHERE uid = #{uid} AND qid = #{qid} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rank WHERE qid = #{qid}
